mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book (bid, bname, bprice, isbn, pubdate, publisher, authorid, summary, contents) values (seq_book.nextval, #{bname}, #{bprice}, #{isbn}, #{pubdate}, #{publisher}, #{authorid}, #{summary}, #{contents})
mapper.update: update tbl_book set bname = #{bname}, bprice = #{bprice}, isbn = #{isbn}, pubdate = #{pubdate}, publisher = #{publisher}, authorid = #{authorid}, summary = #{summary}, contents = #{contents} where bid = #{bid}
update tbl_book_stock set stock = #{stock} where bid = #{bid}
update tbl_order set orderstate = #{orderstate} where orderid = #{orderid}
